name: Purspect
description:
Change between a 3D and 2D perspective to see which obstacles are coming next and avoid them by jumping. This retro styled platformer is challenging and playable on Windows, Linux and Android.

Features:

  • Change between 3D-Follow-Camera and 2D-Sidescrolling-Camera
  • Every run is different with procedurally generated, infinite runs
  • A bunch of different obstacles, including moving ones

Have fun!
